```bash
brew install ffmpeg --with-faac --with-fdk-aac --with-ffplay --with-fontconfig --with-freetype --with-libass --with-libbluray --with-libcaca --with-libsoxr --with-libquvi --with-frei0r --with-libvidstab --with-libvorbis --with-libvpx --with-opencore-amr --with-openjpeg --with-openssl --with-opus --with-rtmpdump --with-schroedinger --with-speex --with-theroa --with-tools --with-x265
```

## 
ffmpegffmpeg

```bash
ffmpeg -i your_video -vcodec libx264 -preset fast -crf 20 -y -vf "scale=1920:-1" -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k your_output
```

| -vf    | 1920  |  |
| -acodec |  |  |
| -ab| 326496128 | 128 |

Post.title: Gitlab-CI
Post._content:
(Continuous Integration) Code CompleteSteve McConnellIncremental Integration

* 
* 
* Sonar,findbug
* Code Review

## Gitlab-Runner
Gitlab-CI Runner , , Runner

* Runner (:, : Runner)
* Runner (Runner)
* DockerRunner (dockerdocker)

GitLab-RunnerGit Clone  RunnerGit,

![gitlab-ci](http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/525728-4339103186d2b1c9.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2)

Runner  Runner

## Gitlab-Runner
[](https://docs.gitlab.com/runner/install/)

```bash
# For MacOS 
brew install gitlab-ci-multi-runner

# For Debian/Ubuntu 
curl -L https://packages.gitlab.com/install/repositories/runner/gitlab-ci-multi-runner/script.deb.sh | sudo bash
sudo apt-get install gitlab-ci-multi-runner

# For RHEL/CentOS 
curl -L https://packages.gitlab.com/install/repositories/runner/gitlab-ci-multi-runner/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash
sudo yum install gitlab-ci-multi-runner
```

## gitlab-ci-multi-runnerRunner
gitlab-ci-multi-runnerGitLab-CIRunnerGitlab-Runner:

* Shared Runner: gitlab
* Specific Runner: (Runner)

GitLab-CIRunnerGitLab-CIurltokentokenRunnerShared RunnerSpecific Runner

gitlab Runners, ciRunner
![gitlab-runner](http://wx2.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwt8499g7j21kw0u5gwc.jpg)
 url  token , Runner

```bash
#RunnerCI
$ gitlab-ci-multi-runner register
Running in System-mode
Please enter the gitlab-ci coordinator Url:
#-->CI URL
Please enter the gitlab-ci token for thus runner:
#-->Token
Please enter the gitlab-ci description for this runner:
#-->Runner
Please enter the gitlab-ci tags for thus runner(comma separated):
Please enter the executor:
#-->  Shell
#-->

$ gitlab-ci-multi-runner list   // 
$ gitlab-ci-multi-runner start  // RunnerService
```
RunnerGitlabRunner
![gitlab-runner](http://wx2.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwubaypawj21kw0iodm5.jpg)

## Runner
git .gitlab-ci.yml 

```bash
build:
	script: "pwd & mvn test"
```
 Pipelines 
![gitlab-ci](http://wx2.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwujg6ti7j21kw0l00z6.jpg)

## 
Pinpoint
### 
PinpointNode1Node2HTTPHTTP headerTraceIDPinpointSpanTraceTraceID:

* Span:TraceId
* Trace:SpanRPCSpanstraceTransactionID,TraceSpanIdParentSpanId
* TraceID: TransactionId, SpanId(64),  ParentSpanId(64) key. TransactionId IDSpanId  ParentSpanId RPC-
* TransactionIdAgentIDs(hostnameIP),JVM

IDkeykeykey

![](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fl65rkvn6qj215w0niae6.jpg '5 ')

### Trace
543rpc

![](http://wx1.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fl65rqgpx9j21bs0nmtdx.jpg '6 trace')

TransactionID(TxId) rpc TransactionID rpc rpc  SpanId  ParentSpanId  Tomcat  SpanId httpParentSpanId rpc SpanId

SpanId  ParentSpanId 64 -2^64 ~ 2^64 

### 

rpcpinpoint pinpoint-agent rpc

![](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fl65ryql33j21990mzgom.jpg '7 ')

8

![](http://wx4.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fl65rvfmpsj21520nete5.jpg '8 ')

 agent 

```
javaagent:$AGENR_PATH/pinpoint-bootstrap.jar
-Dpinpoint.agentId=<Agents UniqueId>
-Dpinpoint.applicationName=<the name of service>
```

Post.title: Sonar
Post._content:
## Sonar
SonarSonar 

 Hudson/Jenkins Sonar  FindBugsPMD  Web 

![ffmpeg](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwouel8vmj21kw0ua0zk.jpg)
<!-- more -->

Sonar  IDE  Eclipse  IntelliJ IDEA  Sonar  Sonar
Sonar Java 

## Sonar
 Sonar [Sonar](https://www.sonarqube.org)6.5()[github](https://github.com/SonarSource/sonarqube)

zip bin 


```
bin/linux-x86-64/sonar.sh -h          // 
bin/linux-x86-64/sonar.sh start       // 9000
```

 http://localhost:9000 , : admin/admin

## Sonar
Sonar  Derby Sonar  Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL  MySQL  Sonar :

```bash,monokai
mysql> CREATE USER sonar IDENTIFIED BY 'sonar';
mysql> GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'sonar'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'sonar' WITH GRANT OPTION;
```
 sonar.properties (sonar/sonar)
![sonar_config](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwoukblqyj20nr07s404.jpg)
sonarsonar

## Sonar
 Java  Java sonar[]->[]->[]
![sonar_auth](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwowmxps5j20wi06mq3r.jpg)
### MavenSonar
Maven  Sonar  Sonar  pom.xml  Maven  settings.xml  maven :

|  |  |  |
|--------|---------|-------|
| sonar.host.url | sonar | http://127.0.0.1:9000|
| sonar.login | sonar | token(token) |
| sonar.password | sonar | admin |
#### sonartoken
,
![sonar_auth](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwouqs7woj21d20vkk4l.jpg)

#### Maven
:

```bash
<profile>
        <id>sonar</id>
        <activation>
            <activeByDefault>true</activeByDefault>
        </activation>
        <properties>
            <sonar.host.url>http://localhost:9000</sonar.host.url>
            <sonar.login>93a87b9d138cd836b65c2c52fc5578fc71270707</sonar.login>
        </properties>
    </profile>
```


```bash
mvn clean install
mvn sonar:sonar
```
 Soanr  Sonar Sonar sonar
![sonar_auth](http://wx1.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwouu8uz2j21h00zugr6.jpg)


### SonarGitlab
#### 
gitlabrunner.gitlab-ci.yml[gitlab-ci](https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000006120164) 

```yml
#  stages
stages:
 - review
 - analyze
#  review
job1:
 stage: review
 script:
 - /usr/local/sbin/code_analyze --preview    #gitlabDiscussions
 except:
 - master
#  analyze
job2:
 stage: analyze
 script:
 - /usr/local/sbin/code_analyze             #sonarmaster
 only:
 - master
```

code_analyzegitsonar

```bash
#!/bin/bash
set -e
echo "test"
if [ "$1" = "--preview" ];then
    echo ${CI_BUILD_REF}
    echo ${CI_BUILD_REF_NAME}
    echo ${CI_PROJECT_DIR}
    echo ${CI_PROJECT_ID}
	sonar_prop="-Dsonar.issuesReport.console.enable=true -Dsonar.analysis.mode=preview  -Dsonar.preview.excludePlugins=issueassign,scmstats -Dsonar.gitlab.commit_sha=${CI_BUILD_REF} -Dsonar.gitlab.ref=${CI_BUILD_REF_NAME} -Dsonar.gitlab.project_id=${CI_PROJECT_ID}"
    if [ -f "gradlew" ]; then
	    ./gradlew clean check sonarqube $sonar_prop
    else
	    mvn --batch-mode clean verify sonar:sonar $sonar_prop
    fi
else
	sonar_prop="-Dsonar.preview.excludePlugins=gitlab"
	if [ -f "gradlew" ]; then
		./gradlew clean check sonarqube $sonar_prop
	else
        #mvn clean org.codehaus.mojo:cobertura-maven-plugin:2.7:cobertura -Dcobertura.report.format=xml -Dcobertura.aggregate=true
		mvn --batch-mode verify sonar:sonar $sonar_prop
    fi
fi

```

#### SonarGitlab Discussion
 gitlab  Merge_requesrs  gitlab  Discussion 
![sonar_auth](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwowereo8j21fg0j6dk1.jpg)

gitlabsonar gitlab  User Settings Access Tokens 
![sonar_auth](http://wx2.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwowhpph2j21kw0ubdnt.jpg)

 sonar token,  token  api, sonar scope  api
![sonar_auth](http://wx1.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwowk9xhsj20x006wwfb.jpg)
![sonar_auth](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwowmxps5j20wi06mq3r.jpg)

### MavenSonar
Maven  Sonar  Sonar  pom.xml  Maven  settings.xml  maven :

|  |  |  |
|--------|---------|-------|
| sonar.host.url | sonar | http://127.0.0.1:9000|
| sonar.login | sonar | token(token) |
| sonar.password | sonar | admin |
#### sonartoken
,
![sonar_auth](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw1024/78d85414ly1fkwouqs7woj21d20vkk4l.jpg)

#### Maven
:

```bash
<profile>
        <id>sonar</id>
        <activation>
            <activeByDefault>true</activeByDefault>
        </activation>
        <properties>
            <sonar.host.url>http://localhost:9000</sonar.host.url>
            <sonar.login>93a87b9d138cd836b65c2c52fc5578fc71270707</sonar.login>
        </properties>
    </profile>
```


```bash
mvn clean install
mvn sonar:sonar
```
 Soanr  Sonar Sonar sonar

### SonarGitlab
#### 
gitlabrunner.gitlab-ci.yml[gitlab-ci](https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000006120164) 

```yml
#  stages
stages:
 - review
 - analyze
#  review
job1:
 stage: review
 script:
 - /usr/local/sbin/code_analyze --preview    #gitlabDiscussions
 except:
 - master
#  analyze
job2:
 stage: analyze
 script:
 - /usr/local/sbin/code_analyze             #sonarmaster
 only:
 - master
```

code_analyzegitsonar

```bash
#!/bin/bash
set -e
echo "test"
if [ "$1" = "--preview" ];then
    echo ${CI_BUILD_REF}
    echo ${CI_BUILD_REF_NAME}
    echo ${CI_PROJECT_DIR}
    echo ${CI_PROJECT_ID}
	sonar_prop="-Dsonar.issuesReport.console.enable=true -Dsonar.analysis.mode=preview  -Dsonar.preview.excludePlugins=issueassign,scmstats -Dsonar.gitlab.commit_sha=${CI_BUILD_REF} -Dsonar.gitlab.ref=${CI_BUILD_REF_NAME} -Dsonar.gitlab.project_id=${CI_PROJECT_ID}"
    if [ -f "gradlew" ]; then
	    ./gradlew clean check sonarqube $sonar_prop
    else
	    mvn --batch-mode clean verify sonar:sonar $sonar_prop
    fi
else
	sonar_prop="-Dsonar.preview.excludePlugins=gitlab"
	if [ -f "gradlew" ]; then
		./gradlew clean check sonarqube $sonar_prop
	else
        #mvn clean org.codehaus.mojo:cobertura-maven-plugin:2.7:cobertura -Dcobertura.report.format=xml -Dcobertura.aggregate=true
		mvn --batch-mode verify sonar:sonar $sonar_prop
    fi
fi

```

## 


![](http://wx2.sinaimg.cn/mw690/78d85414ly1fo48r9x850j20x40hagtp.jpg "1 ")

### (Bidding Strategies)

### (Time Series Analysis)

## 

### 
  

T$T = 24$  

$${\arg _\Theta }\min \sum\limits_{\forall d,t} {loss(h({X_{d,t}};\Theta ),{Y_{d,t}}),1 \le d \le D,1 \le t \le T} $$

$D$   ${Y_{d,t}}$  d   t ${h({X_{d,t}};\Theta )}$    

### 


### 
dsp

1. LastNDayReqs: NSlot
2. LastSlotReqs: Slot()
3. SlotNumber: 



![](http://wx3.sinaimg.cn/mw690/78d85414ly1fnylmc94zaj215w0i60x0.jpg "2 SlotNumber")

 SlotNumber 

SlotNum  T 

$$SlotNu{m^k}(i) = 1,k = i$$
$$SlotNu{m^k}(i) = 0,k \ne i$$

 ${i \in (1,T)}$    T=24

$$SlotNu{m^1} = [1,0.......0,0]$$

### 
    k
### SmoothedLastSlotReqs
ktt:

1. t, 

  $$originalLastReqs = Reqs(0,t)$$
 $t$   $Reqs$ k 

2.  k 

$$avg = {1 \over k}\sum\limits_{i = 1}^k {Reqs(i,t)} $$
$$st{d^2} = {1 \over k}\sum\limits_i^k {{{(reqs(i,t) - avg)}^2}} $$

3.   

$${{\left\| {originalLastReqs - avg} \right\|} \over {std}} > tol$$
tol 

$$lastSlotReq{s^{k + 1}} = {\rm{ }}\prod\limits_{i = 0}^k {Reqs(k,t)} $$


$$lastSlotReqs = originalLastReqs$$

### SmoothedNDayReqs
 $SmoothedNDayReqs$  

$$lastNDaysReq{s^k} = \prod\limits_{i = 1}^k {Reqs(t + 1,i)} $$

### PredictTraffic
   1 

$${\arg _\Theta }\min \sum\limits_{\forall d,t} {loss(({\omega ^T}{X_{d,t}} + b) - {Y_{d,t}}),1 \le d \le D,1 \le t \le T} $$

 ${X_{d,t}} = [lastNDayreqs,lastSLotreqs,slotNum]$ , ${{\omega ^T}}$$b$   $({\omega ^T},b)$  

1. $Reqs(i,j)$, $i$       $j$ 
2.  $t$
3.   $lastNDayReq{s_t} = SmoothNDayReqs(Reqs,t,T,k)$
4.   $lastSlotReq{s_t} = SmoothLastSlotReqs(Reqs,t,T,k)$
5.   ${X_{t}} = [lastNDayreqs_{t},lastSLotreqs_{t},slotNum_{t}]$
6. $h({X_t};\omega ,b)$
